metadata.title: UAE Plans to Invest $1 Billion in African AI Infrastructure
metadata.description: The United Arab Emirates plans to invest $1 billion to expand artificial intelligence infrastructure and services across Africa, bolstering its influence on a continent that’s lagged behind the rest of the world in adopting the technology.
metadata.keywords: United Arab Emirates,Artificial Intelligence,Infrastructure,Africa,Government,Foreign Affairs,G-20,Johannesburg,Developing Countries,Renewable Energy,technology
